attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jon Vennables is a Murderer .He should be denied all anonymity for what he has done.He Killed a defenceless little boy,
James Bulgers parents are living a life sentence .
What about the human rights of James Bulgers family?

We the undersigned want Jon Vennables anonymity removed .

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
